NK001(ka)039:0: byang chub sems bskyed kyi sdom pa'i brgyud 'debs la //
NK001(ka)039:1: ga mar 'phags pa 'jam dpal nas klu sgrub la
NK001(ka)039:2: stsal ba'i dbu ma lugs kyi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs
NK001(ka)039:3: ni / rnam 'dren stobs bcu'i mnga' bdag zas gtsang sras //
NK001(ka)039:4: rgyal sras 'jam dpal klu sgrub zla ba grags //
NK001(ka)039:5: rig pa'i khu byug ku s+aa la che chung //
NK001(ka)039:6: gsol ba 'debs so gzhan phan mthar phyin shog /
NK001(ka)039:7: jo bo thang ba dza dang 'jigs med 'byung //
NK001(ka)039:8: zla rgyal gro lung pa dang byang chub 'o. //
NK001(ka)039:9: rma bya sh+aaka seng mchims chen smon tshul pa //
NK001(ka)039:10: gsol ba 'debs so gzhan phan mthar phyin shog /
NK001(ka)039:11: byang chub grub pa gzhon rdor kun mkhyen rje //
NK001(ka)039:12: khyab brdal lhun grub grags 'od sangs rgyas dbon //
NK001(ka)039:13: zla grags kun bzang rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal //
NK001(ka)039:14: gsol ba 'debs so gzhan phan mthar phyin shog /
NK001(ka)039:15: sna tshogs rang grol bstan 'dzin grags pa'i zhabs //
NK001(ka)039:16: mdo sngags bstan 'dzin 'phrin las lhun grub dpal //
NK001(ka)039:17: 'gyur med rdo rje ngag dbang chos dpal sde //
NK001(ka)039:18: gsol ba 'debs so gzhan phan mthar phyin shog /
NK001(ka)039:19: yid bzhin legs grub rin chen rnam par rgyal //
NK001(ka)039:20: oo di y+aa na gsang sngags bstan 'dzin rje //
NK001(ka)039:21: 0d+ma dbang rgyal sangs rgyas kun dag'i zhabs //
NK001(ka)039:22: gsol ba 'debs so gzhan phan mthar phyin shog /
NK001(ka)039:23: mkhyen brtse'i dbang po tshe dbang nor bu'i dpal //
NK001(ka)039:24: rgyal sras o rgyan rnam grol rgya mtsho'i sde //
NK001(ka)039:25: rin chen byang chub sems brgyud bla ma la //
NK001(ka)039:26: gsol ba 'debs so gzhan phan mthar phyin shog /
NK001(ka)039:27: yon tan gzhir gyur bshes gnyen gus brten nas //
NK001(ka)039:28: rnyed daka'i rten las snying po len spro zhing //
NK001(ka)039:29: mi rtag 'chi ba rjes dran dkar nag gi //
NK001(ka)039:30: las 'bras spang blang tshul bzhin spyod par shog /
NK001(ka)039:31: srid bde 'khrul par shes nas thar pa'i sgor //
NK001(ka)039:32: bag yod khrims kyi 'jug cing 'khor mtsho las //
NK001(ka)039:33: 'gro kun 'dren pa'i khur khyer tshad med kyi //
NK001(ka)039:34: byang chub sems mchog 'byongs par byin gyis rlobs //
NK001(ka)039:35: skye bar tshul gnas thos bsam sgom par brtson //
NK001(ka)039:36: rgyal ba'i bstan la bya ba cher 'grub cing //
NK001(ka)039:37: sgo gsum gzhan phan spyod las mi g.yel bas //
NK001(ka)039:38: 'gro kun byang chen lam la 'god par shog /
NK001(ka)039:39: rgyal tshab ma pham pa nas 'phags pa thogs med
NK001(ka)039:40: la stsal ba'i sems tsam lugs kyi brgyud pa'i khyad
NK001(ka)039:41: par ni / .na gnyis mthar phyin rnam 'dren zas gtsang sras //
NK001(ka)039:42: rgyal tshab ma pham thogs med dbyig gi gnyen //
NK001(ka)039:43: rnam grol grol sde mchog sde dul ba'i sde //
NK001(ka)039:44: gsol ba 'debs so gzhan phan mthar phyin shog /
NK001(ka)039:45: snang mdzad seng bzangs sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs //
NK001(ka)039:46: gu na mi tra rin chen zla ba dang //
NK001(ka)039:47: bstan skyong rngog lo 'bre chen shes rab 'bar //
NK001(ka)039:48: gsol ba 'debs so gzhan phan mthar phyin shog /
NK001(ka)039:49: byang chub ye shes gzhon tshul zhang g.ye ba //
NK001(ka)039:50: gnyal zhig 'ching ru chu mig seng ge dpal //
NK001(ka)039:51: lho brag pa dang btsan dgon dben dge ba //
NK001(ka)039:52: gsol ba 'debs so gzhan phan mthar phyin shog /
NK001(ka)039:53: chos dpal rgyal mtshan kun mkhyen chos kyi rje //
NK001(ka)039:55: 'di gnyis rig 'dzin gter bdag gling pas mdzad pa
